item.title: Your ideas are wanted for my next Slideshare Presentation
item.description: Well hello Dear Reader As you probably know - I really enjoy putting together a good presentation and publishing it on Slideshare— over the past year, I’ve averaged one presentation a month and managed to be featured on Slideshare 3 times. So I’m looking for ideas on social media or marketing strategy or something else for my next presentation — and I’d like to have your ideas.
